Program.name: Program
Program.description: Represents information about the enrollment and disbursement of benefits in a program.

ActiveEnrolleeCount.description: The count of program enrollees in active status.

AdditionalContext.description: The additional context about the program.

CurrentMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the current month.

CurrentYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the current year.

EndDate.description: The date when the program ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Required. The name of the program.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

PreviousMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the previous month.

PreviousYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the previous year.

StartDate.description: The date when the program begins.

TotalEnrolleeCount.description: The total enrollee count in the program.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the program.
